text: This evening, I had the pleasure of welcoming over 600 esteemed researchers from all EU countries at Aarhus City Hall for a groundbreaking conference on sustainability and psychological well-being. As a pioneering city, Aarhus actively participates in EU programs such as Horizon Europe and LIFE, further propelling our efforts towards carbon neutrality by 2023.
